© 2018 Film Studio DEVINI, MasterFilm, MagicLab, Studija 2","datePublished":"2018-04-20","description":"A life-provoking, hopeful and solemn story about the growth of one human child and the relationship with the world in Latvia at the end of the 1930s.","keywords":"child","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6020486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"reinis-74572","dateCreated":"2018-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"A correct representation of the book","reviewBody":"The film is a rather direct representation of the book of the same name. As a result, it is factually correct but loses some of the book's deeper qualities. Artistically well done, especially with the flawless major roles. Some of the minor characters didn't correspond well with the expected behavior of the generation. 

The team consists of local superstars and this could be a bit too much for locals, but not a problem to foreigners. So, if you wish to see a historically correct representation of year 1939 in Latvia in the eyes of an 8 years old girl from a poor and troubled family (although intelligent and loving in its own way) who later turns out to be one of the brightest stars in Latvian literature and a shortlisted Nobel candidate of several years - go ahead.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":668,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"duration":"PT1H44M"</script><metacontent="

FBI: Created by Craig Turk, Dick Wolf. With Missy Peregrym, Zeeko Zaki, Jeremy Sisto, Ebonee Noel. Procedural drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the FBI, bringing to bear all the Bureau's skills, intellect and mind-blowing technology to keep New York and the country safe." investigation","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Anti-American Leftist Propaganda","reviewBody":"Horrible show that depicts the FBI as corrupt and incompetent, and every criminal is a victim of the USA and American culture. I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8}}</script><metacontent="

I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8</script><metacontent="

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":167962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

drama","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Amy_cosmicchic86","dateCreated":"2016-10-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"So far, so good!","reviewBody":"Despite the rush of people on IMDb who seem strangely desperate to trash this new show; I personally, as a fan of procedural crime dramas and team "puzzle of the week" shows like House M.D, really quite enjoy Bull so far. The first episode had an intriguing premise, the second episode built up the team members' characters enough to at least make them likable, and I think Michael Weatherly is enjoying the role massively and it shows in his winning performance. The psychological aspect of the show is something I don't think we see enough of on television in general and even if some of it is pumped up into quick, flashy computer bites, it still aids the story which is really all it's meant to do. As shows in their infancy go, I think this one is off to a promising start. Bull is a well-shot bit of interesting fun and I will definitely keep watching!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15947,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7</script><metacontent="

drama","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5827228/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jonij-77617","dateCreated":"2016-12-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Trials, Philosophy, and Bad Guys, Oh my!!","reviewBody":"Don't listen to the Naysayers, and cynics on this review status. This TV show Bull is good, but like many others along this line, you have to remember it is just getting started. Just like any new product that has problems and kinks, they have to be fixed and then rolled out again. Also, trying to care and mend people is a very well difficult and tasking thing to do, but he does it with a bit of style, grace and oh, getting up in people's faces that deter him with a calm demeanor. Thus, with his experience, this is something he does to get a better scope or compass about them, trying to capture their character so he will know where to go next. I also like his crew, each one does a good job with all they need to do, and with a bit of spirited confidence and can-do attitude alongside of a small amount of humor and comedy. \n\nThe premise of this show is interesting, trying to get into the minds of people to see how they think and what moves them. This character Dr. Bull (Michael Weatherly) seems to care about these people, the defendant, the jury and everyone in between. He even takes the diamond in the rough, the little guy and even the underdog, and makes them become a little better than they were. Besides, I love how his character seems to take the problems that come before him with a cool and rational angle, even when he goes up against a bad guy. Together with his crew this drama, Bull, shows signs of definite potential. So give it a chance, even with its minor snags, you might just learn something about yourself.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15651,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7</script><metacontent="

investigation","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7491982/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Johnny_West"},"dateCreated":"2020-12-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Anti-American Leftist Propaganda","reviewBody":"Horrible show that depicts the FBI as corrupt and incompetent, and every criminal is a victim of the USA and American culture. I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8}}</script><metacontent="

Leftist Propaganda","reviewBody":"Horrible show that depicts the FBI as corrupt and incompetent, and every criminal is a victim of the USA and American culture. I never imagined that any show about the FBI could be so hateful against the United States.

The assistant Chief of the New York division, played by the lame Jeremy Sisto, spends his time trying to overturn convictions because he spent ten years in the FBI blacking out due to alcoholism, and sleeping with his subordinate, who covered for his mis-deeds. That is the new FBI.

In almost every episode, the FBI agents discuss the criminals, murderers, terrorists, etc., as being the victims of U. S. society, American values, white America, etc. Every story throws new shade on the FBI and/or the USA as a nation, or American culture.

I have never seen any of the FBI agents say, "Wow that guy was just plain evil," unless it was a white Anglo who was (always) a racist, Neo-Nazi, white supremacist, etc. The message of this show is that white people are evil, and everyone else, including the criminals, are victims of "White America." I am not white, and I find this show incredibly disturbing.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":11503,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0452046, Title: Criminal Minds, --- Description: Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive","datePublished":"2005-09-22","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":171965,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":171965,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8</script><metacontent="

Minghella","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189596/","name":"Mark Crowdy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0272401/","name":"Craig Ferguson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Doc Martin: Series 8","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2606414105","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWU0NDQ5NTctYjJmOC00MmRjLWEwYzItYjNjYzllNTY2YWI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Doc Martin: Season 8","datePublished":"2004-09-02","description":"The trials and tribulations of Dr. Martin Ellingham (Martin Clunes), a socially challenged doctor who moves from London to the picturesque village of Port Wenn in Cornwall.","keywords":"socially awkward man,doctor,opposites attract,fear of blood,rural setting","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0408381/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"groggo","dateCreated":"2007-12-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Brits Know How to Do It","reviewBody":"Doc Martin is so unusual and wonderfully off-kilter that it becomes addictive within 20 minutes of exposure. 

The titular Doc is a guy who was probably a curmudgeon before puberty. He's a surgeon from sophisticated, worldly London who moves to (fictional) Portwenn on the coast of Cornwall because he suddenly becomes ill at the sight of blood. This is not a good omen for a surgeon. He quits to become a general practitioner and he's satisfied, thanks very much, with checkups, prescriptions and referrals.

The foul-mannered, blunt-spoken Doc smugly considers himself above the crowd, but he soon learns he is really BELOW the crowd, out of step with Portwenn's eccentricities, value systems and peculiar burghers, who make the mere lunatics of London look normal by comparison.

Martin Clunes is terrific in the lead role. He is a tall, charismatic and not exactly handsome actor who looks like he would be more comfortable playing cops and heavies. He is, instead, a consummate comic actor. His facial and physical comedy, his frequent bouts of exasperation and bewilderment, are things to behold. (Note: some wags have compared him to 'House,' from the popular TV drama of the same name. House is played by Hugh Laurie, another splendid Brit, and that's about where the comparison begins and ends. They are two very different characters in two very different shows.)

Portwenn's local population, with its twisted logic that somehow makes perfect sense, is represented through the tour-de-force acting of supporting players: Bert (Ian McNeice, who always dazzles playing offbeat, world-weary philosophical characters); Louise (the charming and beautiful Caroline Catz), who either loves Martin or wants to kill him; corn-rowed Elaine (lovely Lucy Punch) as the ditzy assistant with her own set of secretarial ethics; and Doc's Aunt Joan (the great Stephanie Cole, who has been delighting audiences since the 1960s).

Dominic Minghella, he of the Minghella mob of talented artists (brother Anthony directed 'The English Patient'), is the brains behind this brilliant controlled chaos.

Don't miss this program. TV shows that are both funny AND intelligent are the rarest of TV fare.

And a fast footnote: let us all bow our heads and pray that Hollywood doesn't try to remake this.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":13331,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods","datePublished":"2010-09-24","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jdonalds-5","dateCreated":"2014-12-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"My favorite","reviewBody":"Blue Bloods is currently my favorite TV program. The casting is great, story lines are very interesting, but what I really enjoy is every episode presents a dilemma where both sides are presented and mulled over.

Direction makes a movie or TV show. It can make or break a story line and Blue Bloods continues to please. It astounds me that a series of rotating directors are tied to these episodes, including actors such as Donnie Wahlberg, with rarely a low point in the episode list.

I do so much appreciate a movie or TV show where the good guys are really good guys and they win as often as possible.

The Sunday dinners are a high point of the show.

It would please me if this series goes on for 15 seasons. I would be truly bummed if this series was cut short. I'm sure there are enough story lines in New York City to keep this show alive and interesting for a very long time.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34097,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6</script><metacontent="

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods","datePublished":"2010-09-24","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33582,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1600194, Title: Hawaii Five-0, --- Description: Hawaii Five-0: Created by Peter M. Lenkov, Alex Kurtzman, Leonard Freeman, Roberto Orci. With Alex O'Loughlin, Scott Caan, Taylor Wily, Daniel Dae Kim. Steve McGarrett returns home to Oahu in order to find his father's killer; The Governor offers him the chance to run his own task force - Five-0." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1600194/","name":"Hawaii Five-0","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGMxNDUxMzMtNTgwZS00ZjVlLTkyNmUtNGEzYzQ0YjY3OTAxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTYzMDM0NTU@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1533927/","name":"Alex O'Loughlin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004790/","name":"Scott Caan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1711334/","name":"Taylor Wily"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0176022/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0314568/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006997/","name":"Peter M. Lenkov","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476064/","name":"Alex Kurtzman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293480/","name":"Leonard Freeman"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hawaii Five-0: The First Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1902746649","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJkZDA0YjItYzA1MC00ZDMxLTk4NzYtYjFhMTk4NWIwMWIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjJkZDA0YjItYzA1MC00ZDMxLTk4NzYtYjFhMTk4NWIwMWIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Hawaii Five-0: The First Season","datePublished":"2010-09-20","description":"Steve McGarrett returns home to Oahu in order to find his father's killer; The Governor offers him the chance to run his own task force - Five-0.","keywords":"hawaii,teamwork,yakuza,police,swimwear","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1600194/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jodogo59","dateCreated":"2010-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Shows Promise but...","reviewBody":"Let's start with arguably the best and most recognized TV score of all time. If the producers want to use the original theme song, then why shorten it? It reminded me of the truncated TV tunes of re-runs in syndication.

Now for the pilot episode. I thought it odd that Hawaii 5-0 would open with a scene in South Korea. It's like stumbling out of bed in the morning not exactly sure what you're going to do that day.

There are also seemed to be to much gun play and not enough acting. The dialog and some of the background setup (Danno's family situation, for example) was a bit too cliché. Some of the personal background could be better developed over time rather than cramming it into one episode while chasing the bad guys.

The overall storyline for the pilot was excellent, though. It gave background to 5-0's beginnings and it maintained a certain consistency and plausibility with TOS while adding the dimension of McGarrett and his father.

Some of the dialog resulted in an approving chuckle from me.

The episode began to gel about 2/3 in and by the end of the show, I felt comfortable with the main characters and looked forward to the next chapter.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":68668,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0081859, Title: The Fall Guy, --- Description: The Fall Guy: Created by Glen A. Larson. With Lee Majors, Douglas Barr, Heather Thomas, Markie Post. The adventures of a film stuntman who moonlights as a bounty hunter when movie work is slow." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0081859/","name":"The Fall Guy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJkNWQxMTktNTVlMi00YjY3LWEzODAtMTk1YmE5YzBjMGM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzM3NDI3._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000516/","name":"Lee Majors","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0056492/","name":"Douglas Barr","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001793/","name":"Heather Thomas"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056447/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0088140/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488991/","name":"Glen A. Larson"],"datePublished":"1981-11-04","description":"The adventures of a film stuntman who moonlights as a bounty hunter when movie work is slow.","keywords":"pickup truck,male protagonist,bounty hunter,stunt,stuntman","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0081859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mm-39","dateCreated":"2003-06-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"This show raised the Bar.","reviewBody":"Sure, this show had holes in it, it is cheesy, but I loved it. In Junior High I grew up on this, and it influenced me greatly. I can not watch boring sit coms, which maybe have 2 sets, or even cheaper made reality tv shows. Do I really care who gets voted off the island , or can keep their hand on a rock for 2 hours. After years of watching Colt drive through a china shop with his truck, use the trailer part of the truck which is used to move cars as a ramp, use a a rocket pack and hang onto the side of a chopper. All in a hour show! This show raised the bar high. My wife hates Heather Thomas. and says she's there for her anatomy, with her lines "Colt he's got a gun or "Oh Colt." Howie was funny, and added good comedy. The Unknown stunt man theme was great. I loved the time some thugs beat up an identical truck to Colt's and he drives off with the real one and these 2 huge guys leaving the bar say, "hey what did you to my truck." Speaking of trucks I think that truck must have started the SUV craze, with the imprint it left on many 30 and 40 year olds minds. I love the Mad comic spoof on this show. A must watch.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6892,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7</script><metacontent="

Jay Cox"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"New in Town: Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1554121497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIyNjYwNDU4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMzNDEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIyNjYwNDU4N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMzNDEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"RenÃ©e Zellweger stars as a Miami-based consultant whose latest assignment, to restructure a manufacturing plant in small-town Minnesota, causes her to reconsider her professional and personal objectives once she settles into her new life. "},"datePublished":"2009-05-20","description":"A Miami, Florida businesswoman adjusts to her new life in a small Minnesota town.","keywords":"united states of america,man carries a woman in his arms,new ulm minnesota,going hunting,union rep","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1095174/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"zagsrus"},"dateCreated":"2009-06-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Satisfied","reviewBody":"As a single independent female i look forward to these types of movies. Some deliver and some do not. If i can come away feeling hopeful and positive then it did its job. And i can assure you this movie did just that for me. It was cute and entertaining. The locations were complete opposites. Hot and humid in Miami and freezing in Minnesota. To see a character adapt to the cold after living in Florida and then also to adapt to the conservative lifestyles portrayed in this particular small northern Minnesota town, challenging. Renee always delivers. Harry Connick Jr. stole the show with his comedic timing. And the Actress playing Blanche and actor playing Stu also very funny. And did i mention the soundtrack ROCKS!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":22200,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Six by Sondheim
Six by Sondheim
programme.desc: Six by Sondheim: Directed by James Lapine, Autumn de Wilde, Todd Haynes. With Barbara Barrie, Jack Bashkow, Charles Braswell, Susan Browning. An intimate and candid look at the life and art of the legendary composer-lyricist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3385404/","name":"Six by Sondheim","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NDUxNzgwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzg0MTc3MDE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Documentary"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0057363/","name":"Barbara Barrie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2470137/","name":"Jack Bashkow"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0105493/","name":"Charles Braswell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0487567/","name":"James Lapine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2127315/","name":"Autumn de Wilde"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001331/","name":"Todd Haynes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0459094/"}],"datePublished":"2013-12-09","description":"An intimate and candid look at the life and art of the legendary composer-lyricist.","keywords":"composer,broadway,musical theater,artist","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3385404/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JonnyOneNote"},"dateCreated":"2014-01-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A wonderful documentary, with an unexpected bonus","reviewBody":"This is a wonderful documentary, composed chiefly of interviews Stephen Sondheim has given in the past, with the addition of the musical numbers, some specifically filmed for this HBO documentary.\n\nAnd it is one of those versions I want to address: James Lapine's filmed version of "Opening Doors" from "Merrily We Roll Along." It stars Darren Criss, Jeremy Jordan, and America Ferrara, and I truly wish this version was available as a full-length film version of the difficult- to-produce musical. It brought back the magic I felt seeing this in a 1982 version in Washington DC and later in a 1983 Los Angeles Equity production. Subsequent revisions of the script and songs have left me feeling flat, including the much-raved-about recent London production. These three actors have the charm and innocence and musical presence that was required of the original roles, and they recreate the period and excitement with thrilling results. During their number, I kept thinking, "Where is this version?! Why isn't there a movie version with this cast?" Kudos to all involved in truly bringing back to life "Merrily We Roll Along" (and to that sly actor singing about songs having "hummable" and "memorable" melodies).","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":711,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer","datePublished":"2001-06-03","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"aabonander","dateCreated":"2021-01-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"Even more profound almost 20 years later","reviewBody":"I watched Six Feet Under when it originally aired on HBO. Hard to believe that was almost 20 years ago. At the time I remember thinking this was the best thing I'd ever seen on television. It was too good for television. It just transcended anything I had ever seen. Over the years I've recommended the show to countless others. After recommending it to another friend recently I decided to rewatch the show. I finished the series in less than two weeks and it is still one of the best things I've ever seen on TV. The effect this show has on me is even more profound today than it was the first time I watched it. This show punches you in the gut. It makes you think. It makes you reflect. It makes you question your choices. It makes you evaluate life. A lot of incredibly great television series have come along since Six Feet Under originally aired but none of them will hit you as deep as this show.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":125197,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0413573, Title: Grey's Anatomy, --- Description: Grey's Anatomy: Created by Shonda Rhimes. With Ellen Pompeo, Chandra Wilson, James Pickens Jr., Justin Chambers. A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0413573/","name":"Grey's Anatomy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjgwNGNkZGYtMWQyYS00YjEzLWFmZTctODUzYWMxOWJkNTAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0690186/","name":"Ellen Pompeo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0933156/","name":"Chandra Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0681782/","name":"James Pickens Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0170849/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0722274/","name":"Shonda Rhimes"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 12 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi17412889","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NjQyOTkzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDI5NTY4NjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Season 12 of Grey's Anatomy from ABC.","datePublished":"2005-03-27","description":"A drama centered on the personal and professional lives of five surgical interns and their supervisors.","keywords":"surgeon,hospital,lesbian,work romance,surgery","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413573/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"CherylAG","dateCreated":"2005-04-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another great show for ABC","reviewBody":"I love this show. I didn't know if I would like it or not, because I'm not a big ER fan, due to the depressing parts, however "Grey's Anatomy" has a lot more depth to it on so many levels. Let's face it, who really wants to talk about death? This show involves some humor, unlike ER, but you also get the blood and guts popping out, very sad moments, more involved stories about the DR's personal life's, issues that are bombarding our medical care in this country today and the great music puts it over the top. It's more of a "tug at your heart strings" kind of show when it comes to death and also there are some politics involved, which i highly think should be brought up in this day and age-such as being a full donor and saving peoples lives, rather than rotting away. I'm actually surprised it's not a David Kelly Show (Boston Legal) - it seems like something he'd create. Anyway, you have to watch this show- it's completely addicting-- and I only watched it since i like Patrick Dempsey on the off chance it may be a good show--Wow, was I pleasantly surprised. I did also like Boston Legal, but not nearly like "Greys." Hopefully there is room for both of them on Sunday nights.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":266456,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5</script><metacontent="

A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3501074/","name":"Madam Secretary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJiMTNiNDktZGM1ZS00NmU3LWFiNmQtNjc0ZjNlMTU5ZjAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004857/","name":"Tim Daly","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2706992/","name":"Erich Bergen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111281/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075256/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355329/","name":"Barbara Hall"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madam Secretary: Series Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153522201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer","datePublished":"2014-09-21","description":"A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family.","keywords":"politician,secretary of state,chief of staff,political conflict,politics","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3501074/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"chiefwaller","dateCreated":"2016-07-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"In my favorite top ten of all time","reviewBody":"I don't write reviews very often. More and more I find myself being enthralled by shows that appeal to my better angels. As opposed to shows that appeal to the lowest common denominator, degrading, profane, glamorizing immorality, etc. Madam Secretary, is an excellent example of what can be right with television. It makes me want to be a better person on many levels. There are characters who are worth emulating, dialogue worthy of memory and quoting. It is witty, charming, and challenging. There is a real attempt to show consequence for actions both good and evil. Is it realistic? Sometimes yes, sometimes no. It is not only interesting and entertaining, it is a sophisticated morality tale.\n\nAgain, I want to reiterate: I am a better person for watching Madam Secretary.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20770,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 2345737, Title: The Rover, --- Description: The Rover: Directed by David Michôd. With Guy Pearce, Chan Kien, Tek Kong Lim, Tawanda Manyimo. 10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2345737/","name":"The Rover","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4MTc1MzMxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzc4NDA4MTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001602/","name":"Guy Pearce","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500155/","name":"Robert Pattinson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1058940/","name":"Scoot McNairy"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2391575/","name":"David Michôd"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0141203/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296971/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0062793/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2391575/","name":"David Michôd","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0249291/","name":"Joel Edgerton"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"UK Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1629137945","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3NTE5MjcxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzcyMzA0MjE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3NTE5MjcxMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzcyMzA0MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.","datePublished":"2014-06-20","description":"10 years after a global economic collapse, a hardened loner pursues the men who stole his only possession, his car. Along the way, he captures one of the thieves' brother, and the duo form an uneasy bond during the dangerous journey.","keywords":"australia,brother brother relationship,money,post apocalypse,road trip","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2345737/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"maiveh-263-654104","dateCreated":"2015-03-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pattinson's Best Performance Ever","reviewBody":"I was very motivated to watch this movie because I truly admire Pattinson as a full on artist. I had the feeling his performance was going to be good,but I honestly didn't expect "great", and I was so taken over by it! I'm happy he had this chance to show he it's not "just a handsome face". After this performance powerful yet subtle and mighty professional, Pattinson shows what he is made of. I hope after this he gets more roles and invitations to work for serious movies. He reminds me of both DiCaprio and Pitt at the beginning of their careers. Guy's performance was off the charts. Don't miss his expression on th last 10 minutes of the movie. It's of the best I have seen him deliver. I believe this movie will never be a crowd pleaser because it is way too artistic to be popular, there a many symbols and allegories to losses that will be missed... It's a work of art though. Perseverance pays off Mr. Pattinson. Keep up the good work and good luck.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":45664,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"duration":"PT1H43M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chernobyl
Chernobyl
Chernobyl
programme.desc:
Chernobyl: Created by Craig Mazin. With Jessie Buckley, Jared Harris, Stellan Skarsgård, Adam Nagaitis. In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7366338/","name":"Chernobyl","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGQ2YmMxZmEtYjI5OS00NzlkLTlkNTEtYWMyMzkyMzc2MDU5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQ2MDI5NjU@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","History","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2976580/","name":"Jessie Buckley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364813/","name":"Jared Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001745/","name":"Stellan Skarsgård"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0571744/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166478/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0563301/","name":"Craig Mazin"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3724524825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTVhYzgzZWYtNDIxYy00YThkLThiMWItOTJmNTI0ZjA4MjI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTVhYzgzZWYtNDIxYy00YThkLThiMWItOTJmNTI0ZjA4MjI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","description":""Chernobyl" dramatizes the story of the 1986 accident at the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant in Ukraine, Soviet Union, one of the worst man-made catastrophes in history, and the sacrifices made to save Europe from the unimaginable disaster. "Chernobyl" premieres May 6 on HBO."},"datePublished":"2019-05-06","description":"In April 1986, an explosion at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant in the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics becomes one of the world's worst man-made catastrophes.","keywords":"tv mini series,propaganda,nuclear accident,radiation,nuclear radiation","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7366338/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"stelmakh"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Goosebumps and tears","reviewBody":"A Belarusian here, born in 1983. Parents were scientists, knew everything on the 27th. Chernobyl is never forgotten in Belarus and all the details of the tragedy (a flawed reactor, Soviet style apparatchiks in control, a failed experiment, a clumsy cover-up) are widely known. Yet the series managed to depict the horrible events in a way never before seen. A definite tour de force, I had to literally pause a couple of times to comprehend what had just been shown. Goose bumps and tears, what a masterpiece. Likvidatory - heroes, who contained Chernobyl - should never be forgotten.

Grim Soviet atmosphere depicted accurately apart from some very very minor details. Surprised that a Swedish director who made music videos for Madonna and his English-speaking cast managed to portray Chernobyl events better, than anybody from the countries most traumatized by the explosion.

The tragedy will live forever because of this haunting masterpiece, what a brilliant creative achievement.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":595854,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":9.4}}</script><metacontent="

Chernobyl is never forgotten in Belarus and all the details of the tragedy (a flawed reactor, Soviet style apparatchiks in control, a failed experiment, a clumsy cover-up) are widely known. Yet the series managed to depict the horrible events in a way never before seen. A definite tour de force, I had to literally pause a couple of times to comprehend what had just been shown. Goose bumps and tears, what a masterpiece. Likvidatory - heroes, who contained Chernobyl - should never be forgotten.

Grim Soviet atmosphere depicted accurately apart from some very very minor details. Surprised that a Swedish director who made music videos for Madonna and his English-speaking cast managed to portray Chernobyl events better, than anybody from the countries most traumatized by the explosion.

The tragedy will live forever because of this haunting masterpiece, what a brilliant creative achievement.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":595854,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":9.4</script><metacontent="

Season 4 of the Italian mafia drama, "Gomorrah," premieres May 20, 2021 on HBO Max."},"datePublished":"2014-05-06","description":"Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.","keywords":"treason,shifting power,dialect,sicilian mafia,camorra","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2049116/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"genuinemucker"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best series on TV by a LONG way","reviewBody":"On flicking through the TV one night I stumbled onto this at Episode 8 (I learned later). I'm not a big fan of subtitled series, but I found the lead role's mohawk haircut interesting enough to keep me tuned in for longer than usual. The rest is history. Once you start watching Gennnaro Savastano (played by Salvatore Esposito) you will be addicted. The macho man of all macho men, he looks like he could burst you with one right hook. As if one magnetic actor wasn't enough, along comes Salvatore Conte (played by Marco Palvetti), a suave slickster with an instantly addictive accent and way of expressing himself. The action is constantly moving at perfect pace, the settings are beautifully contrasted. Everything about this series is brilliant, even the bit-part players are magnetic, one such character brilliantly named Tonino Spiderman. This is a must-own series for all gangster movie/TV series buffs, and the great thing about it is, not a lot of people know just how mind-blowingly brilliant it is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32094,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6}}</script><metacontent="

Once you have fallen in, there is no escaping it. Season 4 of the Italian mafia drama, "Gomorrah," premieres May 20, 2021 on HBO Max.","datePublished":"2014-05-06","description":"Ciro disregards tradition in his attempt to become the next boss of his crime syndicate. The internal power struggle puts him and his entire family's life at risk.","keywords":"treason,shifting power,dialect,sicilian mafia,camorra","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2049116/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"genuinemucker","dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"The best series on TV by a LONG way","reviewBody":"On flicking through the TV one night I stumbled onto this at Episode 8 (I learned later). I'm not a big fan of subtitled series, but I found the lead role's mohawk haircut interesting enough to keep me tuned in for longer than usual. The rest is history. Once you start watching Gennnaro Savastano (played by Salvatore Esposito) you will be addicted. The macho man of all macho men, he looks like he could burst you with one right hook. As if one magnetic actor wasn't enough, along comes Salvatore Conte (played by Marco Palvetti), a suave slickster with an instantly addictive accent and way of expressing himself. The action is constantly moving at perfect pace, the settings are beautifully contrasted. Everything about this series is brilliant, even the bit-part players are magnetic, one such character brilliantly named Tonino Spiderman. This is a must-own series for all gangster movie/TV series buffs, and the great thing about it is, not a lot of people know just how mind-blowingly brilliant it is.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32094,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.6</script><metacontent="

The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II."},"datePublished":"2010-03-14","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","keywords":"world war two,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war,tropical setting,pacific theater","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"oldturkey03"},"dateCreated":"2010-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"As different from BoB as the Pacific from the European Theater","reviewBody":"I am a great fan of the original Band of Brothers and do realize that some of us do not get the feeling of getting close to the individuals as we did with BoB. The Pacific theater was different. The Japanese warfare was, and I suppose still is, different. I do not believe that it is fair to compare Pacific to BoB. We are trying to compare Apples and Oranges. I think that this miniseries is a great piece of historical story telling. Having read some complaints about the historical accuracy of the statement made in episode 3. What a wonderful thing that there are people out there that know the real history. Is it not a good thing that this miniseries actually gets us involved? That some, if not most of us, actually go and try to learn more about what had happened? Is it not a good thing that we hear names like Basilone ( a real hero), E.B.Sledge, and Robert Leckie? Normal people that have performed and endured in an utmost,and admirable way. If this miniseries has the power in getting our younger generation interested in this part of our history, it has done a wonderful thing. I would recommend for anybody watching this series to go and investigate the facts, read and educate oneself about the soldiers that fought for our freedom and for democracy. The only negative thing about this series is that the episodes are to short and the 7 days between episodes is to long. To all the Veterans past and present, thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":103346,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3}}</script><metacontent="

The Pacific theater was different. The Japanese warfare was, and I suppose still is, different. I do not believe that it is fair to compare Pacific to BoB. We are trying to compare Apples and Oranges. I think that this miniseries is a great piece of historical story telling. Having read some complaints about the historical accuracy of the statement made in episode 3. What a wonderful thing that there are people out there that know the real history. Is it not a good thing that this miniseries actually gets us involved? That some, if not most of us, actually go and try to learn more about what had happened? If this miniseries has the power in getting our younger generation interested in this part of our history, it has done a wonderful thing. I would recommend for anybody watching this series to go and investigate the facts, read and educate oneself about the soldiers that fought for our freedom and for democracy. The only negative thing about this series is that the episodes are to short and the 7 days between episodes is to long. To all the Veterans past and present, thank you.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":103346,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3</script><metacontent="

The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0374463/","name":"The Pacific","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmEwNmI1MjItNjNjYy00NDE5LWJiNTYtM2QxMTI5ZjllZTBhL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0197647/","name":"James Badge Dale","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001515/","name":"Joseph Mazzello","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0781218/","name":"Jon Seda"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0040938/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0036575/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Pacific: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3159819545","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc1NjM2NDUzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODgxMDczMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A 10-part mini-series ftelling the intertwined stories of three Marines during America's battle with the Japanese in the Pacific during World War II.","datePublished":"2010-03-14","description":"The Pacific Theatre of World War II, as seen through the eyes of several young Marines.","keywords":"world war two,u.s. marine corps,horrors of war,tropical setting,pacific theater","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374463/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"oldturkey03","dateCreated":"2010-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"As different from BoB as the Pacific from the European Theater","reviewBody":"I am a great fan of the original Band of Brothers and do realize that some of us do not get the feeling of getting close to the individuals as we did with BoB. The Pacific theater was different. The Japanese warfare was, and I suppose still is, different. I do not believe that it is fair to compare Pacific to BoB. We are trying to compare Apples and Oranges. I think that this miniseries is a great piece of historical story telling. Having read some complaints about the historical accuracy of the statement made in episode 3. What a wonderful thing that there are people out there that know the real history. Is it not a good thing that this miniseries actually gets us involved? That some, if not most of us, actually go and try to learn more about what had happened? Is it not a good thing that we hear names like Basilone ( a real hero), E.B.Sledge, and Robert Leckie? Normal people that have performed and endured in an utmost,and admirable way. If this miniseries has the power in getting our younger generation interested in this part of our history, it has done a wonderful thing. I would recommend for anybody watching this series to go and investigate the facts, read and educate oneself about the soldiers that fought for our freedom and for democracy. The only negative thing about this series is that the episodes are to short and the 7 days between episodes is to long. To all the Veterans past and present, thank you.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":103346,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Against the Wall
Against the Wall
programme.desc: Against the Wall: Directed by John Frankenheimer. With Kyle MacLachlan, Samuel L. Jackson, Clarence Williams III, Frederic Forrest. Based on the true story of the Attica Prison uprising of 1971." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0109053/","name":"Against the Wall","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDY2MTMwN2ItZjUzMi00MGE3LTg3YjYtODMxNTE0NjZmN2JjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","History"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001492/","name":"Kyle MacLachlan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929934/","name":"Clarence Williams III"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001239/","name":"John Frankenheimer"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0404396/","name":"Ron Hutchinson"}],"datePublished":"1994-03-26","description":"Based on the true story of the Attica Prison uprising of 1971.","keywords":"man wrapped in a towel,fellatio,pubic hair,male pubic hair,male objectification","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0109053/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"encyclpedia"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A serious prison film","reviewBody":"It's hard to always understand what prison is like, and Attica depicted an old one, but it was still prison, and it was gripping. This was a good movie. The character played by Kyle Maclachlan was a wimpy one, but yet, a way for us to see things through an innocent standpoint. This was a movie about a prison that was not contained to the proper ordinance and showed what could happen if it wasn't. In that result, it played out to be a movie that can keep you at *awe* and utter despair for the prison gaurds. The role played by Samuel L. Jacson was a good one as well. He is always been such a good actor and to me, he shined in this one, to a point. Those were the good things about it, and my only gripes were seeing naked inmates, Mike Smiths' feistiness, and the totally annoying head gaurd. I forget his name, and I don't much want to know anyways. Aside of those little pests, I enjoyed the film to it's fullest. Frankenheimer did a good job directing this one. This was my rating: 8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2695,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The University of Sing Sing
programme.desc: Über 2000 Straftäter verbüssen im US-Gefängnis Sing Sing lange Freiheitsstrafen. Doch der Knast nahe New York bietet den Häftlingen eine zweite Chance: Dank einer privaten Stiftung können die Insassen Collegekurse besuchen und Abschlüsse erwerben. Viele arbeiten mit unbändiger Energie und unter widrigen Bedingungen. Mit Erfolg: Viele Studenten kehren als verwandelte Menschen in die Freiheit zurück. – Tiefer Einblick in eines der berüchtigtsten US-Gefängnisse und eine inspirierende Geschichte über die Macht der Bildung.

witch","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10361016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sarahpenbridge"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is not Penny Dreadful","reviewBody":"If you came here looking for the grim, supernatural awesomeness of the original Penny Dreadful, then keep on moving. I don't know why this wasn't just sold as some 1950s gangster series. The cast is amazing, great visuals and acting, but there is almost nothing supernatural about this! Which was kind of the entire point of Penny Dreadful. Aside from some dramatic walk-ons in a gorgeous leather gown from Dormer, and some odd side characters she somehow also needs to play, the supernatural aspect is completely missing. There is SO much that could have been done with the story. Disappointed because I was a huge fan of the original PD!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8473,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6}}</script><metacontent="

is not Penny Dreadful","reviewBody":"If you came here looking for the grim, supernatural awesomeness of the original Penny Dreadful, then keep on moving. I don't know why this wasn't just sold as some 1950s gangster series. The cast is amazing, great visuals and acting, but there is almost nothing supernatural about this! Which was kind of the entire point of Penny Dreadful. Aside from some dramatic walk-ons in a gorgeous leather gown from Dormer, and some odd side characters she somehow also needs to play, the supernatural aspect is completely missing. I don't know why this wasn't just sold as some 1950s gangster series. The cast is amazing, great visuals and acting, but there is almost nothing supernatural about this! Which was kind of the entire point of Penny Dreadful. Aside from some dramatic walk-ons in a gorgeous leather gown from Dormer, and some odd side characters she somehow also needs to play, the supernatural aspect is completely missing. witch","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10361016/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sarahpenbridge","dateCreated":"2020-05-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is not Penny Dreadful","reviewBody":"If you came here looking for the grim, supernatural awesomeness of the original Penny Dreadful, then keep on moving. I don't know why this wasn't just sold as some 1950s gangster series. The cast is amazing, great visuals and acting, but there is almost nothing supernatural about this! Which was kind of the entire point of Penny Dreadful. Aside from some dramatic walk-ons in a gorgeous leather gown from Dormer, and some odd side characters she somehow also needs to play, the supernatural aspect is completely missing. There is SO much that could have been done with the story. Disappointed because I was a huge fan of the original PD!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8473,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6</script><metacontent="

a grisly murder shocks Los Angeles in 1938, Detective Tiago Vega and his partner Lewis Michener become embroiled in an epic story that reflects the rich history of the city.","datePublished":"2020-04-23","description":"When a grisly murder shocks Los Angeles in 1938, Detective Tiago Vega and his partner Lewis Michener become embroiled in an epic story that reflects the troubled history of the city.","keywords":"supernatural,los angeles california,spin off,santa muerte,evil witch","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10361016/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"sarahpenbridge","dateCreated":"2020-05-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"This is not Penny Dreadful","reviewBody":"If you came here looking for the grim, supernatural awesomeness of the original Penny Dreadful, then keep on moving. I don't know why this wasn't just sold as some 1950s gangster series. The cast is amazing, great visuals and acting, but there is almost nothing supernatural about this! Which was kind of the entire point of Penny Dreadful. Aside from some dramatic walk-ons in a gorgeous leather gown from Dormer, and some odd side characters she somehow also needs to play, the supernatural aspect is completely missing. There is SO much that could have been done with the story. Disappointed because I was a huge fan of the original PD!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8473,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6</script><metacontent="

Sleeper Cell
Sleeper Cell
programme.desc: Sleeper Cell: Created by Ethan Reiff, Cyrus Voris. With Michael Ealy, Oded Fehr, Henri Lubatti, Melissa Sagemiller. An American undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a terrorist sleeper cell that is planning an attack in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0465353/","name":"Sleeper Cell","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUyNzE5NzkyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjU5MzMzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1013003/","name":"Michael Ealy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004912/","name":"Oded Fehr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0523825/","name":"Henri Lubatti"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0173346/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0717550/","name":"Ethan Reiff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0903456/","name":"Cyrus Voris"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sleeper Cell","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi598981913","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QxNjdhM2UtMzQ3OC00Mjc2LTg2NGEtMWRmZjI2NmNlN2JjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2QxNjdhM2UtMzQ3OC00Mjc2LTg2NGEtMWRmZjI2NmNlN2JjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sleeper Cell"},"description":"An American undercover FBI agent is assigned to infiltrate a terrorist sleeper cell that is planning an attack in Los Angeles.","keywords":"fbi agent,fbi federal bureau of investigation,terrorist,die hard scenario,multilingual","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0465353/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Smcgivney1"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Series!","reviewBody":"I love the show. The acting is great and I think Alex Nesic will be one of our sexiest men in the future. Now I must note that the first show had an error that was quite blatant to me. The penitentiary in Lompoc, California is where I used to live. It is not pronounced "Lompak", but is pronounced "Lompoke". I was surprised that was not noticed and corrected. Also I wonder how Darwin gets by with carrying and using his cell phone w/o question? That I find confusing. I would think the leader would get that phone and check the calls just to keep a good check on the members. Other than that, I look forward to the episodes. Can someone tell me what nights this will be on and what channel? thanks."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6026,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8}}</script><metacontent="
